name: Unidentified_Jedi_(Tao)

attributes.name: Died
values: Generations prior to the rebellion on Tao

content:
A male human Jedi served in the Jedi Order before retiring and eventually dying on the Outer Rim planet Tao. Before dying, the Jedi entrusted his lightsaber to an ancestor of the Yasaburō clan and trained him in lightsaber combat.
Thereafter, the Jedi's lightsaber became an heirloom passed down through the generations of the Yasaburō family from parent to child. Each head of family taught their successor how to wield the lightsaber and bequeathed it as an inheritance.
The Jedi was depicted in a hologram in "Lop & Ochō," a short film in the Star Wars: Visions series written by Sayawaka and directed by Yuki Igarashi. The short, produced by Geno Studio, was released on Disney+ on September 22, 2021.
